topics.body: Is it weird that a majority of Digimon fanfics and doujins are yaoi?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547eb18363687235f8f50100#post_547eb18363687235f8f50100

I'm a major fan of two series. This one and Saint Seiya. Both have a major yaoi following (Even some doujin's from CLAMP, yes that one, from back in the day before their rise to fame)

No, I don't think that's a coincidence

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547eb24c6368720dc21e0000#post_547eb24c6368720dc21e0000

If that was the case no other series would've been made. The reason Xros wars was even made in the first place was because of Savers. Come Xross Wars where they even had to use characters from other seasons (some are even bitch slap cameos) just to get people to watch it.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547eb25b6368723578730200#post_547eb25b6368723578730200

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547eb2946368720882430000#post_547eb2946368720882430000
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547eb24c6368720dc21e0000#post_547eb24c6368720dc21e0000
Is that why they're doing a continuation of Adventure and Adventure 02 next Spring?[/bq]
Pretty much; adventures and adventure 02 were the most viewed series in the franchise so it makes sense to bring back the original digidestined.

If they bring back the digidestined from adventures and adventure 02 and it's successful we might see more of tamers, but I doubt frontier will get anything else done with it because even though frontier was decent the viewership towards the end started going downhill and it wasn't well received.  I don't think they'll ever do anything ever again with savers or xross wars cause that would be financial suicide.


Tl:dr; my guess is they're going to bring back the digidestined from adventure and adventure 02; they might bring back tamers eventually, but definitely not savers or xross wars because that would be financial suicide and I highly doubt they'll bring back frontier.

topics.body:
ok so, i orbited around kerbin

what do i do next?
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547eb69d636872176ae50000#post_547eb69d636872176ae50000
Try to land on the moon.

Spoiler: Have most of your weight on the first stage and the next stage is a small lander whose purpose is to land and then get back.

Basically the lighter you make the final stage the less fuel you need to get to the moon which means you need less fuel to get back meaning you can make your final stage really tiny.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
